Articles.Content:
For this challenge, you must do the most crazy, difficult or just the coolest stunt you can in KSP. Think of it as a contest to show off your KSP skills by doing stunts to impress the judges. You can use a plane, rover or a rocket, but the craft must be controlled by a kerbal and must be all stock parts and no mods what so ever, you could also just do your stunt on EVA. Your kerbal must survive. 1 stunt can not win or can a place in more than one category. Please included screenshots, and if you can, a video. People who post videos do have a higher chance of placing due to the fact that the judges and I can clearly tell what is going on. Your stunt will get reviewed by judges (me and another KSP player) who then decides if it places in any categories, which are:

The Most Crazy: The stunt that is the most insane.

The Hardest: The stunt that is the hardest to do.

The Most Epic: The stunt that is the best, in different ways.

And they is the best overall. 1 stunt can get a place in one category and still get the best overall.

If you want to be put in a certain category, please list it. It is also helpful to give your stunt a name

There is 1st, 2nd and 3rd places for each category. If somebody does a better stunt then somebody who has a place, the person who is third for the category loses their place.
